content: वर्णिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वर्णोऽस्त्यस्य इनि] (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Having the colour or appearance of. {@--2@} Belonging to the caste of. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A painter. {@--2@} A scribe, writer. {@--3@} A religious student, a Brahmacārin <ab>q. v.</ab>; अथाह वर्णी <ls>Ku. 5. 65</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 5.">52</ls>; वर्णाश्रमाणां गुरवे स वर्णी विचक्षणः प्रस्तुतमाचचक्षे <ls>R. 5. 19.</ls> {@--4@} A person of any one of the four principal castes.
